channel.title: Setting up a shop@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
channel.description:
I've prepared a pk points system for my server.
and a shop that can sell items for those "pk points" i need to make.
How do i get an npc with the trade option to open up a shop window and have the shop opened.
Or at least an npc that has a talk to option where when you talk to him that also opens the shop.
I'd rather have the talk to option though. and for the shop to utilize the pk points instead of coins?
Anyone have any ideas?
BASICALLY I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO GET AN NPC TO HOST A SHOP
THIS IS FOR A 317!!!!!! HELPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP
